verses.verse: And it came to <S%H8050>pass<s%>, when Samuel was <S%H2204>old<s%>, that he <S%H7760>made<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H1121>first-born<s%> was <S%H3100>Joel<s%>; and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H4932>second<s%>, <S%H29>Abijah<s%>: they were <S%H8199>judges<s%> in <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%>.

And his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> not in his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, but turned <S%H5186>aside<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1215>lucre<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7810>bribes<s%>, and <S%H5186>perverted<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%>.
Then all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6908>together<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> unto <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>;

and they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2204>him<s%>, Behold, thou art old, and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> not in thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>: now <S%H7760>make<s%> us a <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> us like all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

But the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3415>displeased<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>, when they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5414>Give<s%> us a <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H8050>us<s%>. And Samuel <S%H6419>prayed<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>, <S%H8085>Hearken<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> in all that they <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H3988>thee<s%>; for they have not rejected <S%H3988>thee<s%>, but they have rejected <S%H4427>me<s%>, that I should not be king over them.

According to all the <S%H4639>works<s%> which they have <S%H6213>done<s%> since the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought them <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> even unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, in that they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H5647>me<s%>, and served <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, so do they also unto <S%H6213>thee<s%>.

Now therefore <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto their <S%H6963>voice<s%>: <S%H389>howbeit<s%> thou shalt <S%H5749>protest<s%> <S%H5749>solemnly<s%> unto <S%H5046>them<s%>, and shalt show them the <S%H4941>manner<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> that shall reign over <S%H4427>them<s%>.
And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>told<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H7592>asked<s%> of him a <S%H4428>king<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, This will be the <S%H4941>manner<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> that shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> over <S%H3947>you<s%>: he will take your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H7760>appoint<s%> them unto <S%H4818>him<s%>, for his chariots, and to be his <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>; and they shall <S%H7323>run<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4818>chariots<s%>;

and he will <S%H7760>appoint<s%> them unto him for <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%>, and <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H2572>fifties<s%>; and he will set some to <S%H2790>plow<s%> his <S%H2758>ground<s%>, and to <S%H7114>reap<s%> his <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, and to <S%H6213>make<s%> his <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, and the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of his <S%H7393>chariots<s%>.
And he will <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to be <S%H7548>perfumers<s%>, and to be <S%H2879>cooks<s%>, and to be <S%H644>bakers<s%>.

And he will <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H7704>fields<s%>, and your <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, and your <S%H2132>oliveyards<s%>, even the <S%H2896>best<s%> of <S%H5414>them<s%>, and give them to his <S%H5650>servants<s%>.
And he will take the <S%H6237>tenth<s%> of your <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and of your <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> to his <S%H5631>officers<s%>, and to his <S%H5650>servants<s%>.

And he will <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H5650>men-servants<s%>, and your <S%H8198>maid-servants<s%>, and your <S%H2896>goodliest<s%> young <S%H970>men<s%>, and your <S%H2543>asses<s%>, and <S%H6213>put<s%> them to his <S%H4399>work<s%>.
He will take the <S%H6237>tenth<s%> of your <S%H6629>flocks<s%>: and ye shall be his <S%H5650>servants<s%>.

And ye shall cry <S%H2199>out<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of your <S%H4428>king<s%> whom ye shall have <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3068>you<s%>; and Jehovah will not <S%H6030>answer<s%> you in that <S%H3117>day<s%>.

But the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>; and they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H4428>Nay<s%>: but we will have a king over us,

that we also may be like all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and that our <S%H4428>king<s%> may <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H3318>us<s%>, and go out <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3898>us<s%>, and fight our <S%H4421>battles<s%>.
And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and he <S%H1696>rehearsed<s%> them in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>, <S%H8085>Hearken<s%> unto their <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H4427>make<s%> them a <S%H4428>king<s%>. And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> ye every <S%H582>man<s%> unto his <S%H5892>city<s%>.
